query: Could you assist me in creating a seven-day travel plan for two individuals, departing from Seattle and exploring three different cities in California from March 4th to March 10th, 2022? Our budget is now set at $5,500. We require accommodations that are suitable for children under the age of 10 as we will be traveling with our young ones. We would prefer entire rooms for our stay. Please note, we would prefer transportation options other than self-driving.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Redding,Los Angeles,Santa Rosa]
